title: Grisaia no Kajitsu + BD Specials (BDrip Uncensored) [v2]
description:
Grisaia no Kajitsu + BD Specials (uncensored)

Grisaia no Kajitsu in English: The Fruit of Grisaia

Video resolution of the episodes is 1280x544 (although some videos say they are 1280x720 that is because they have black bars up and down...the actual resolution is 1280x544).
the "real" aspect ratio of the episodes is 2:35:1 like the original aspect ratio they had in the retail BD's.
that is the aspect ratio of the episodes on the next season (Grisaia no Rakuen) BD's as well.
the "special" episodes that came with the BD's are SD sized (480p) and have a aspect ratio of 16:9 (strange...since they never aired on TV....)


Notice:
this is version 2 since in my original torrent the subs in some episodes were a bit small (they were hard-coded so i couldn't fix that...), also since i used higher quality RAW videos to make these the quality is also better :-)

=======================================================

Series Viewing Order and torrents:


1 - Grisaia no Kajitsu (The Fruit of Grisaia):
13 Episodes + 6 Specials



2 - Grisaia no Meikyuu (The Labyrinth of Grisaia):
Just 1 Episode + 1 Special



3 - Grisaia no Rakuen (The Eden of Grisaia):
10 Episodes (as of today,September 3rd 2015.. only the first 2 episodes have been released uncensored)
